alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 15 at 11:04AM EST until November 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect rain is expected to transition to lake effect snow on Wednesday evening. Snow will pick up in intensity before dawn on Thursday morning, as snow fall rates could increase to about one inch per hour. Snow will wane in intensity during the daytime hours on Thursday and the most organized snow bands will start setting up over the lake by Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
